Title: House of Lies
Actors: Don Cheadle, Kristen Bell, Ben Schwartz, Daphne Duplaix, Glynn Turman, Dawn Olivieri , Josh Lawson, Megalyn Echikunwoke
Plot: A subversive, scathing look at a self-loathing management consultant from a top-tier firm. Marty, a highly successful, cutthroat consultant is never above using any means (or anyone) necessary to get his clients the information they want.
